price: Ubwo umuvandimwe wabo Swalehe yababwiraga ati “Ese ntimwatinya Allah?”
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ صَٰلِحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum ṣāliḥun alā tattaqūna
